## Source: ossf-package-analysis (14cedd23e6bae51ff5fafc836054c77df341bd710f0abfcb79a8e8b74e47eb31)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@shopify.com/shopifyql-parser' @ 3.400.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
